RepresentativeComplaints.Description: THERE'S A TRANSMISSION FLUID LINE THAT RUN IN THE RADIATOR TO COOL THE FLUID.  THE TRANSMISSION FLUID LINE CRACKED INSIDE THE RADIATOR CAUSING RADIATOR FLUID TO LEAK INSIDE MY TRANSMISSION.  IT DESTROYED MY TRANSMISSION CAUSING A $5,000 REPAIR BILL. *TR
